handled from backend first then frontend team

Actual Result: Latex issue in the questions, for example: AS/A Levels Chemistry Chapter Chemical Energetics

Summary / Title: Verify Redirection  and functionality of Revison Notes "Watch Videos" feature
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
Pre Condition: Select A levels in the app

1. Click on IGCSE Biology 
2. CLick on Chapter 2
3. Click on 2.01 - Cell Structure and Organisation (I)
4. Click on Watch Videos
Expected Result: It should redirect to the Revision Notes content page of IGCSE Biology 1.01 - Characteristics of Living Organisms of app.homeschool.asia and should be able to watch videos
Actual Result:
Redirected to the page of app.homeschool.asia
Saying "unauthorised to perform this action"

Summary / Title: Revision Notes content disappears after zooming out
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1.The issue occurs inside the Revision Notes section within any chapter.
2. The content loads normally at first.
3. When the user zooms out even once, all the content becomes blank.
4. Zooming back to normal does NOT restore the content.
5. User must reload the Revision Notes page to make the content appear again.
Expected Result: The Revision Notes content should remain visible after zooming in or out.
Actual Result: Content becomes blank after zooming out, and does not return even after restoring normal zoom. Reloading is required.

Summary / Title: Verify user access to topical videos without authorization errors.
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Learning Hub.
2. Scroll down to "Topical Videos for every lesson" section.
3. Select any lesson.
Expected Result: The video should open or redirect to the respective video page.
Actual Result: Displays error message: “Unauthorized to perform this action.”

Summary / Title: Verify that the user cannot create a planbook with past dates. summary
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on "Create Plan" Button
2. Select the start date to the past date. and enter all required field
3. Click on the save button
Expected Result: The error message "StartDate must be greater than current date" should be displayed
Actual Result: When a past date is selected, the “Create Plan” button is still visible and clickable. Upon clicking, the system displays the error message.

Actual Result:
